questions.question: たなかさん（＿）犬は　とてもかわいいです。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

AのB - B that belongs to A (possessive)

犬（いぬ） - dog

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「たなかさんのいぬはかわいいです」 means "Tanaka's dog is very cute."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is の.

  • が - subject marker
  • を - object marker
  • は - topic marker, needs to come after "犬" here

questions.question: きのう　こうえん（＿）さんぽしました。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～でさんぽします - to take a walk at/in (place)

こうえん - park

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「こうえんでさんぽしました」 means "I took a walk in the park."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is で.

  • に - direction/time, not place of action here
  • を - object marker, not used here
  • が - subject marker

questions.question: かいしゃ（＿）はたらいています。
questions.hint:
Grammar Help:

～で働く - to work at (place)

かいしゃ - company

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉

「かいしゃではたらいています」 means "I work at a company."
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect Answer

The correct answer is で.

  • を - object marker
  • に - direction/time, not used with "work"
  • が - subject marker
